summary: "The Devil Wears Prada" is a 2006 American comedy-drama film about the fashion world, directed by David Frankel and starring Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, and Emily Blunt. Based on a novel, the film was popular and made a lot of money. Critics loved it, especially Streep's performance, which won her many awards. Shooting took place in New York and Paris. Many fashion designers were afraid to appear in the film, thinking it might upset a powerful editor who inspired the main character. Later, even she admitted she liked the movie.
title: The Devil Wears Prada (film)
